briefTitle: Comparison of MENOPUR Liquid and Powder in Women Undergoing Assisted Reproductive Technology (ART)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind Double-dummy Trial Comparing MENOPUR Solution for Injection in a Pre-filled Pen and MENOPUR Powder and Solvent for Solution for Injection (Menotropins for Injection) in a GnRH Agonist Cycle in Women Aged 18-42 Years Undergoing an Assisted Reproductive Technology Program

interventions.name: MENOPUR solution for injection in pre-filled pen, 1200 IU/1.92 mL
MENOPUR powder and solvent for solution for injection, 75 IU
Placebo (for MENOPUR solution for injection in pre-filled pen)
Placebo (for MENOPUR powder and solvent for solution for injection)

summary: Development of multiple follicles and pregnancy in ovulatory women undergoing controlled ovarian stimulation as part of an assisted reproductive technology (ART) cycle.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: On Day 1 after oocyte retrieval (up to 23 days after start of stimulation)
